welcome header: Share your passion for books with others
welcome text: Welcome to our book rating page! We are a community of people who love reading and sharing their experience with others. On our website, you can rate books you have read and view opinions of other users.
discover text: Discover brand new, unusual books thanks to our website
rate text: Rate the books you read and share your opinion with others
discuss text: Discuss about books with other users and contribute to our great community
